name: Iron Fist

ranks.rankDescription: Do 40% more unarmed damage, with a chance to cripple limbs
Do 60% more unarmed damage, with a chance to stagger your opponent following a blow to the torso
Do 80% more unarmed damage, with a chance to knock down your opponent following a blow to the head
Do 100% more unarmed damage, with a chance to paralyze your opponent in V.A.T.S.

description: Increased damage with fists and unarmed weapons.
